melting.ionCorrection.magnesiumCorrections

Class Owczarzy08MagnesiumCorrection

  • java.lang.Object
    • melting.ionCorrection.magnesiumCorrections.Owczarzy08MagnesiumCorrection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CorrectionMethod, NamedMethod
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Owczarzy08MixedNaMgCorrection

    public class Owczarzy08MagnesiumCorrection
extends Object
implements CorrectionMethod, NamedMethod
    This class represents the magnesium correction model owc08. It implements the CorrectionMethod interface Richard Owczarzy, Bernardo G Moreira, Yong You, Mark A Behlke, Joseph A walder, "Predicting stability of DNA duplexes in solutions containing magnesium and monovalent cations", 2008, Biochemistry, 47, 5336-5353.

      • isApplicable

        public boolean isApplicable(Environment environment)
        Description copied from interface: CorrectionMethod
        Check if the environment chosen by the user is a applicable with the correction model.
        Specified by:
        isApplicable in interface CorrectionMethod
        Returns:
        false if the correction method can't be used with the Environment. If the environment can make the results less reliable, a warning message will appear.

      • correctMeltingResults

        Description copied from interface: CorrectionMethod
        This method is called to correct the computed melting temperature.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
